title: Jagannath
description: Humanity faces extinction as a monster that feeds on our fears ravages the planet in this apocalyptic sci-fi thriller.They call it the a remorseless, shapeshifting creature that will stop at nothing to destroy humanity. Ever since it rose from the depths of the ocean, its lust for human blood has been insatiable. But most terrifying of all is that it doesn’t just stalk us as prey—it absorbs our intelligence, learns our worst fears, and takes their form . . .The military’s arsenal is powerless against the Reaper’s terrifying abilities. Like the Hindu deity Jagannath, it appears to be a “Master of the Universe.” But as they gather in the War Room to study its behavior, they make a startling the key to defeating this all-powerful destroyer may rest in the hands of one brave little girl.
author: Kerry Alan Denney
